title: Script font for logo
content:
Hi everyone,

Can anyone identify the font used for this logo? It may be two different fonts, so any would be great as I need to recreate it.  
The second one I have compressed to make a little clearer.

Thanks

Font: 

 Bellevue 

Solved By: 

 [akira1975](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317113942/http:/typophile.com/user/4504 "View user profile.")
